Article.Title: The First Episode Of HBO’s “Silicon Valley” Is Now On YouTube
Article.Content: Don’t have HBO? The first episode of Mike Judge’s “Silicon Valley” is now on YouTube in what can only be an attempt by HBO to lure more people to subscribe to the premium channel. Sadly the episode seems to be not available outside of the US. That’s it. That’s the news. Now go watch the show. It’s pretty great even if Elon Musk doesn’t like it.
